subject: Greetings to you Dear Valued C
body:
Greetings to you Dear Valued Customer, did you sign anyone as the next of kin to your fund worth $16.5 million dollars. We have one Mrs Linda Summer who has been sending mails to our office claiming you are dead that he is the one who you signed as the next of kin to your fund. Please we want to confirm first if you are dead or alive before we can hand over your fund to her as your next of kin, if you are still alive kindly send us a message to show you are still alive.
There's no more fee for this delivery my dear good friend just only $20 single apple card or steam card for signing up your funds to be sure that the car and the consignment box belongs to you
After you send the signing fee now, you will receive your car and your consignment box within 20 minutes more
Make sure you contact our office email address with all your full information asap
Here is our office email address for you to contact
(
doffice217@gmail.com
)
ARE YOU DEAD OR ALIVE

subject: Re: Greetings to you Dear Valued C
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am very much alive and I have not authorized anyone to claim any funds on my behalf. I do not know who Mrs Linda Summer is and I certainly did not sign her as the next of kin to any fund. 

Please disregard any communication from her claiming to be my next of kin or having any association with me. 

Thank you for bringing this to my attention.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Greetings to you Dear Valued C
body:
Can you please reconfirm me your full information now for me to confirm who
